org.dbasu.robomvvm.componentmodel

Class ComponentAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dbasu.robomvvm.componentmodel.Component
      • org.dbasu.robomvvm.componentmodel.ComponentAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MenuItemAdapter, ViewAdapter

    public class ComponentAdapter
extends Component
    An adapter to make components from arbitrary objects. Make associations between object classes and component adapters classes using ComponentAdapter.Associations. Create or retrieve the component adapter of an object of one of the associated types or their subtypes using get(Object).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ComponentAdapter.Associations
      Can make associations between arbitrary classes and the ComponentAdapter subclasses that are used to make components out of them.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static ComponentAdapter get(java.lang.Object targetObject)
        Create or retrieve the component adapter for the supplied object. Once created, the component adapter is stored as a tag on the supplied object using ObjectTagger, which stores weak references to the supplied object to allow for Garbage Collection. Any component adapter associated with an object that has been garbage collected is not stored internally by the library.
        Parameters:
        targetObject - The object to get the component adapter for.
        Returns:
        The component adapter for the supplied object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - When no component adapter class is associated with the class of the supplied object.

      • getTargetObject

        public java.lang.Object getTargetObject()
        Gets the target object of this component adapter.
        Returns:
        Returns the target object.

      • adapt

        protected void adapt()
        Call this function in subclasses to set up the component adapter.
